name: 60% Engineering QA/QC Review
description: Design development - utilities, grading, calculations, permits

items.text: Plan has uniform size of text and line weights
Check boring & coring log listed properly and located on the plans
Check Excel table sheet numbers are correct
Review and confirm notes and details are modified with municipal requirements
Confirm municipality is listed properly on notes and details and plan set
Verify locations and sizes of existing utilities and that inverts are correct
Are all elements being removed clearly identified?
Are all elements remaining clearly identified?
Provide notes to protect any resources to remain
Review and coordinate the removal and demolition plan with the design layout
Are all keynotes cross reference on the drawings correctly?
Are the keynotes easily understood?
Is all product information that is referenced thorough?
Are site furnishings identified in pay items/keynotes and included in the specifications?
Are the site materials from appropriate climatic region?
Check lighting spacing (if applicable)
Is irrigation required?
Has draft of maintenance of traffic been created and discussed?
Check Rim elevations are correct and listed # of structures reviewed in comments
Verify that the proposed sewer and water is > 10 feet from each other
Provided 18" vertical separation between sewer and water
Verify manholes can accommodate pipe sizes and alignment
Verify Storm and Sanitary Sewer includes inverts, structure elevations, pipes slopes, STA
Is potholing required to identify existing utility information and depths?
Confirm existing and proposed utilities do not have conflicts
Verify proper proposed covers are labeled on structure notes
Provide minimum cover callouts on proposed water main
Typical existing cross-section(s) reviewed and labeled
Typical proposed cross-sections(s) reviewed and labeled properly
Verify that the pavement sections are correct in existing and proposed cross-sections
Has the HMA Application Table been provided and updated?
Review Vertical Alignment (K Values & % Grade)
Review Horizontal Alignment (Radius & Super Elevation)
Are proposed ADA ramps shown with proper removals limits identified for ADA work?
Provide traffic signal data on plans
Provide SESC Design plan with proposed quantities
Provide Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan (SWPPP)
Do details coordinate with local design ordinances?
Confirm all spelling on plan notes, keynotes, and utility callouts (spell check)
Confirm bands in profile have been updated to show correct elevation
Does the sheet index correspond with all the sheets in the set?
Is all sheet numbering correct?
Calculations - Review geotechnical report
Calculations - If site lighting has been proposed, review photometric requirements
Calculations - Have the storm sewer calculations been completed and reviewed?
Calculations - Have the retention/detention calculations been reviewed?
Calculations - Has the sanitary sewer basis of design calculations been reviewed?
Calculations - Has the water main basis of design calculations been reviewed?
Calculations - Has the pavement design been reviewed?
Calculations - After reviewing the geotechnical report, are there any concerns?
Calculations - Review site distances and calculations
Calculations - Review guardrail calculations if applicable
Calculations - Review all taper lengths and include them on plans
Calculations - Has retaining wall calculations been completed and reviewed?
Cost Estimates - Have calculations on quantities been reviewed?
Cost Estimates - Pay item descriptions match the plans, specs, and special provision
Cost Estimates - Review units vs. plans and specifications are industry standards
Cost Estimates - Review unit pricing compares to industry standards
Cost Estimates - Is the proper contingency been applied to the cost estimate?
Permits - Sanitary Sewer: has the permit application been developed and reviewed?
Permits - Water Main: has the permit application been developed and reviewed?
Permits - Rule 5/SESC: has the permit application been developed and reviewed?
Permits - MDOT: is an MDOT permit required and been developed and reviewed?
Permits - Drainage Board/Commissioner: Drain permits developed and reviewed?
Permits - Joint Permit Application: is a permit needed, or not required?
Permit - SHPO: has the SHPO application been applied for?
